Name: MaxRepDelay
ShortDesc: Maximum reporting delay

Name: ServUser
ShortDesc: Identifier of the application acting as user of the on-board monitoring service
Desc: The default user of the service is the ground.

Name: debugVarAddr
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_DEBUG\_VAR elements. The I-th element is the address of the I-th debug variable

Name: dest
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF elements. The I-th element is the destination of the I-th Report Definition in the RDL

Name: isEnabled
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF elements. The I-th element is the enable status of the I-th Report Definition in the RDL

Name: period
ShortDesc: Collection period in units of HK\_COLLECT\_PER

Name: sid
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF elements. The I-th element is the SID of the I-th Report Definition in the RDL

Name: lptTimeOut
ShortDesc: CrPsTimeOut\_t  TimeOut

Name: AreYouAliveTimeOut
ShortDesc: Time-out for the Are-You-Alive Test initiated in response to an Is-Application-Process-Alive Test

Name: OnBoardConnectDestLst
ShortDesc: List of identifiers of target applications for an On-Board-Connection Test

Name: isEidEnabled
ShortDesc: Array of EVT\_N\_EID elements holding the enable status of the event identifiers

Name: lastEvtEid\_1
ShortDesc: Event identifier of the last generated level 1 event report

Name: lastEvtEid\_2
ShortDesc: Event identifier of the last generated level 2 event report

Name: lastEvtEid\_3
ShortDesc: Event identifier of the last generated level 3 event report

Name: lastEvtEid\_4
ShortDesc: Event identifier of the last generated level 4event report

Name: lastEvtTime\_1
ShortDesc: Time when the last level 1 event report was generated

Name: lastEvtTime\_2
ShortDesc: Time when the last level 2 event report was generated

Name: lastEvtTime\_3
ShortDesc: Time when the last level 3 event report was generated

Name: lastEvtTime\_4
ShortDesc: Time when the last level 4 event report was generated

Name: nOfDetectedEvts\_1
ShortDesc: Number of detected occurrences of level 1 events

Name: nOfDetectedEvts\_2
ShortDesc: Number of detected occurrences of level 2 events

Name: nOfDetectedEvts\_3
ShortDesc: Number of detected occurrences of level 3 events

Name: nOfDetectedEvts\_4
ShortDesc: Number of detected occurrences of level 4 events

Name: nOfDisabledEid\_1
ShortDesc: Number of event identifiers of level 1 which are disabled

Name: nOfDisabledEid\_2
ShortDesc: Number of event identifiers of level 2 which are disabled

Name: nOfDisabledEid\_3
ShortDesc: Number of event identifiers of level 3 which are disabled

Name: nOfDisabledEid\_4
ShortDesc: Number of event identifiers of level 4 which are disabled

Name: nOfGenEvtRep\_1
ShortDesc: Number of generated level 1 event reports

Name: nOfGenEvtRep\_2
ShortDesc: Number of generated level 2 event reports

Name: nOfGenEvtRep\_3
ShortDesc: Number of generated level 3 event reports

Name: nOfGenEvtRep\_4
ShortDesc: Number of generated level 4 event reports

Name: CtlRepDelay
ShortDesc: Maximum reporting delay for the CTL in multiples of MON\_PER

Name: CtlTimeFirstEntry
ShortDesc: Time when first entry has been added to the CTL

Name: FuncMonEnbStatus
ShortDesc: Functional monitoring enable status

Name: NmbAvailFuncMon
ShortDesc: Number of available functional monitors in the FMDL

Name: NmbAvailParMon
ShortDesc: Number of available parameter monitors in the PMDL

Name: NmbEnbFuncMon
ShortDesc: Number of enabled functional monitors in the FMDL

Name: NmbEnbParMon
ShortDesc: Number of enabled parameter monitors in the PMDL

Name: ParMonEnbStatus
ShortDesc: Enable state of parameter monitoring function

Name: cycleCnt
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF elements. The I-th element is the cycle counter for the I-th Report Definitions in the RDL

Name: debugVar
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_DEBUG\_VAR elements. The I-th element is the value of the I-th debug variable

Name: lstId
ShortDesc: Max N Items

Name: lstNSampRep
ShortDesc: Max N rep

Name: lstSampleRep
ShortDesc: max N group

Name: nSimple
ShortDesc: max ximple

Name: sampleBufId
ShortDesc: Array of HK\_N\_REP\_DEF elements. The I-th element is the identifier of the Sampling Buffer for the I-th Report Definition in the RDL

Name: largeMsgTransId
ShortDesc: CrPsTid\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the large message transaction identifier associated to the packet in the I-th LPT Buffer

Name: lptFailCode
ShortDesc: CrPsFailCode\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the failure code for the up-transfer to the LPT Buffer

Name: lptRemSize
ShortDesc: CrPsSize\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the remaining size of the large packet in the I-th LPT Buffer (the part of the large packet not yet down-transferred)

Name: lptSize
ShortDesc: CrPsSize\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the size of the large packet in the I-th LPT Buffer

Name: lptSrc
ShortDesc: crPsDestSrc\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the source for the currently on-going large packet up-transfer to the LPT Buffer

Name: lptTime
ShortDesc: CrFwTimeStamp\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the time when the last up-transfer command to the LPT Buffer was received

Name: nOfDownlinks
ShortDesc: conteru4\_t Number of on-going down-link transfers

Name: nOfUplinks
ShortDesc: conteru4\_t Number of on-going up-link transfers

Name: partSeqNmb
ShortDesc: conteru4\_t Array of LPT\_N\_BUF elements. The I-th element holds the part sequence number for the currently on-going large packet transfer to/from the LPT Buffer

Name: failCodeAccFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Acceptance

Name: failCodePrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Progress Check

Name: failCodeStartFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Start Check

Name: failCodeTermFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Termination

Name: invDestRerouting
ShortDesc: Destination of last command for which re-routing failed

Name: nOfAccFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their acceptance check

Name: nOfPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Progress Check

Name: nOfReroutingFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands for which re-routing failed

Name: nOfStartFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Start Check since

Name: nOfTermFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Termination

Name: pcktIdAccFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Acceptance

Name: pcktIdPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Progress

Name: pcktIdReroutingFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command for which re-routing failed

Name: pcktIdStartFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Start Check

Name: pcktIdTermFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Termination

Name: stepPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Step identifier of last command which failed its Progress Check

Name: verFailData
ShortDesc: Verification Failure Data (data item of fixed size but variable

Name: AreYouAliveSrc
ShortDesc: Source of the latest (17,2) report received in response to a (17,1) command triggered by a (17,3) command

Name: OnBoardConnectDest
ShortDesc: Destination of the (17,1) triggered by a (17,3) command
